meanings.definition: Increase or add to, especially in a regular series.
meanings.sent1: She is incrementing the number of flowers in the vase every day.
meanings.sent2: The company is incrementing its profits by expanding into new markets.
meanings.sent3: The chef incrementing the spices in the soup made it too spicy to eat!
meanings.sent4: His dedication to learning incrementing his knowledge like a growing tree.
meanings.sent5: The student's grades were incrementing steadily throughout the semester.

meanings.definition: The action or process of increasing or adding to something.
meanings.sent1: The incrementing of funds in the budget led to a surplus at the end of the year.
meanings.sent2: Incrementing in technology has made our lives easier and more efficient.
meanings.sent3: The incrementing of toppings on the pizza made it a tower of deliciousness!
meanings.sent4: The incrementing of responsibilities at work felt like climbing a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The incrementing of visitors to the museum showed the popularity of the new exhibit.
